title: Servers?
body: In most matches I have 60 ping, but at least once a day I'm stuck in a game where I have 120 to 200 ping. Im assuming its a server thing, is there a way i can set it to only put me on the nearest server?

replies.body:
There is only one Regional server in NA. Rises in latency are most frequently caused by ISP routing changes that can lengthen the time it takes for your connection to reach the server. Sometimes latency can be affected by local network settings, so it's a good idea to go through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a starting point in troubleshooting.

If you still encounter this issue after working through those steps, please let me know.
Bump cuz I seriously want an answer
